modName: Intro Music Replacement - Immersion Edition - DAWNGUARD READY
summary: Skyrim\'s intro music is boring and it doesn\'t do the player character any justice. Why don\'t you fix that?
descriptionHtml:
How many times have you opened this game just to hear a bunch of old people yelling in Spanish? This mod replaces that abomination of a song with something that fits much more comfortably within the bounds of the Elder Scrolls universe.

Update 0.1: First release. This is my first mod, so it\'s probably broken as I have no idea what I\'m doing.
Update 0.2: NMM won\'t let me download this and I figure everyone else is having the same problem. Reordered some files to see if it fixes it.
Nope. No it doesn\'t. If anyone knows how to get a mod to work with NMM, let me know. Until then, install this one the old-fashioned way.
Update 0.2.1a FRIENDS & FAMILY BETA: Nevermind, it does work. Also, there\'s a video. Also, I didn\'t change the file at all, but I\'ve got some great plans for the future. Stay tuned!
Update 0.3 FINAL VERSION (probably): Starts with the regular Skyrim theme, then fades out into the new and improved one. Added by popular request.
author: bupkes
